page.title: 12North East Farming
page.content: The North East Farming Industry is a very competitive industry.There is a {Mart}every Wednesday where sheep and cattle are auctioned.Farmers from inside and outside our area go there to show off their prize cattle and buy some extra cattle.The cattle mostly go to a place called the{North Eastern {Farmers,}which owns a slaughter house and there they would receive a cheque for the amount they have sold.It is not always the richest who produce the best meat.For those who have farming fathers there is a club called The {Young Farmers.}Pig farming is quite common in the{N.E.}In our block there is a pig farm owned by a Mr E Deltesta who has about{1500}pigs,including pregnant sows.The North East of Scotland is mainly farmland.
